description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Flip your world up-side down with 'Scrappy' and air jet across a gravity-defying quest for the Amber of Light!  Puzzles and enemies await in over 40 beautiful and unique levels, TransSubversion will take aim to push your mind and might to the limit!
